reg_pit.acttitle: Special Accounts Appropriation and Control Act
reg_pit.title: British Columbia Training and Education Savings Program Regulation

change.changenote: Section 4 (c) (i) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 79/2016, effective March 16, 2016.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: in the case of a child whose 6th birthday falls in 2013 or 2014, within 3 years after the application commencement date,

change.changenote: Section 4 (c) (i.1) was added by BC Reg 79/2016, effective March 16, 2016.
